channel.title: How to get donator
channel.description:
Hi all, i have tried to change the below so that im donator, but i cant seem to find the right word or number to change it,
i have tried true, 1, yes 2 3
isDonator = 1
any suggestions?
also here is the rest of the code if you need it
[code][ACCOUNT] character-username = feunfhbwf character-password = grgrrggr
[CHARACTER] character-height = 0 character-posx = 3087 character-posy = 3488 character-rights = 3 crystal-bow-shots = 0 VLS-hits = 0 skull-timer = 0 [AGILITY] ag1 = 0 ag2 = 0 ag3 = 0 ag4 = 0 ag5 = 0 ag6 = 0 KC =0 totalstored = 0 DC =0 Used-Pure = 0 catChosen = 0 has-npc = false summonId = 0 EP = 0 magic-book = 0 brother-info = 0 0 brother-info = 1 0 brother-info = 2 0 brother-info = 3 0 brother-info = 4 0 brother-info = 5 0 special-amount = 999999.0 selected-coffin = 0 barrows-killcount = 0 teleblock-length = 0 pc-points = 9993759 Quest1 = 0 dungPoints =999999999 gwdelay = 0 expLamp = 0 dungRest =0 specRest =0 Altar = 0 Arma-KC = 0 Band-KC = 0 Zammy-KC = 0 Sara-KC = 0 D-Points = 9999999 pk-points = 999999 isDonator = 1 slayerTask = 0 xpLock = false Agrith = false Flambeed = false Quest =false Karamel = false Dessourt = false culin = false taskAmount = 0 magePoints = 0 autoRet = 0 trade11 = 0 SpeDelay = 0 barrowskillcount = 0 flagged = true Jailed = false wave = 0 fightMode = 0 lastsummon = 0 summoningnpcid = 0 Monkey-Kc = 0 void = 0 0 0 0 0 [/code]

item.description:
@Venge_Drop wrote:

No, if this is PI and you give yourself donator through the files you dont get the icon beside your name but you have donator, but if you ::givedonar command then it will give you the icon beside your name, is that what your asking?
